location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to George Cumming Osborne, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage; a hole in the body of the letter obscures the precise date of the letter the Resident is replying to.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a communication dated February 1808, which provided cover to a letter from the Superintendent of the Marine.
